*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Jesse Grimes, August 18, 1832. Prepare militia for march against Piedras at Nacogdoches.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*[The] *person_mentioned*Alcalde of the *location_mentioned*jurisdiction of Aus[tin]*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*by proclamation issued on the *date_mentioned n="08-08-1832">8th instance*/date_mentioned* in my absence from this place has ordered the *person_mentioned*Mititia */person_mentioned*to rendevous [at] *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Bowman*/person_mentioned*s*/location_mentioned* on the *date_mentioned n="08-18-1832">18th*/date_mentioned*—*/p*
*p*The future movements of a *person_mentioned*warlike character*/person_mentioned* will be governed by the answer which *person_mentioned*Cap Johson*/person_mentioned* may bring back from *location_mentioned*Nacogdoches*/location_mentioned*, and as it may be highly important to retain the men who may collect, at some point on the *location_mentioned*frontier*/location_mentioned*, until the true situation of things can be ascertained, I must request you under the authority of the *person_mentioned*Alcalde */person_mentioned*to organise the said *person_mentioned*men */person_mentioned*into one or more *person_mentioned*companies*/person_mentioned* according to their numbers, and let them elect their *person_mentioned*company officers,*/person_mentioned* and remain under their command untill further orders.*/p*
*p*I have requested *person_mentioned*Col. Talbot Chambers*/person_mentioned* to assist you with his military knowledge in this business—*/p*
*p*You will make a return to me as soon as practicable of all your proceedings*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="08-13-1832">13 August 1832*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Col of the Battn.*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*To *person_mentioned*Jessee Grimes Regidor of the Ayuntamento of *location_mentioned*Austin*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
